com.acs.bluetooth

Class Acr1255uj1Reader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acs.bluetooth.BluetoothReader
      • com.acs.bluetooth.Acr1255uj1Reader

  • public class Acr1255uj1Reader
extends BluetoothReader
    The Acr1255uj1Reader class represents ACR1255U-J1 Bluetooth readers.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Acr1255uj1Reader.OnBatteryLevelAvailableListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the battery level is available.
      static interface  Acr1255uj1Reader.OnBatteryLevelChangeListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the battery level is changed.

      • Acr1255uj1Reader

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        public boolean authenticate(byte[] masterKey)
        Description copied from class: BluetoothReader
        Authenticates the reader. If you want to receive the authentication result, you need to register a callback using setOnAuthenticationCompleteListener() method.
        Specified by:
        authenticate in class BluetoothReader
        Parameters:
        masterKey - the master key. The length must be 16 bytes.
        Returns:
        true if the reader is connected, otherwise false.

      • enableNotification

        public boolean enableNotification(boolean enabled)
        Enables the reader's battery level, card status and response notifications. If you want to receive the result, you need to register the callback by calling setOnEnableNotificationCompleteListener() method. If you want to receive these status change notifications, you need to register callback by using the following methods:
        • setOnBatteryLevelChangeListener()
        • setOnCardStatusChangeListener()
        Specified by:
        enableNotification in class BluetoothReader
        Parameters:
        enabled - true if start to listen reader's status change, otherwise false.
        Returns:
        true if this operation was initiated successfully, otherwise false.

      • getBatteryLevel

        public boolean getBatteryLevel()
        Gets the battery level. If you want to receive the result, you need to register the callback by calling setOnBatteryLevelAvailableListener() method.
        Returns:
        true if the reader is connected, otherwise false.

      • getCardStatus

        public boolean getCardStatus()
        Gets the card status. If you want to receive the result, you need to register the callback by calling setOnCardStatusAvailableListener() method.
        Specified by:
        getCardStatus in class BluetoothReader
        Returns:
        true if the reader is connected, otherwise false.

      • getDeviceInfo

        public boolean getDeviceInfo(int infoId)
        Gets the device information. If you want to receive the result, you need to register the callback by calling setOnDeviceInfoAvailableListener() method.
        Specified by:
        getDeviceInfo in class BluetoothReader
        Parameters:
        infoId - the identity of the information to be read.
        Returns:
        true if the reader is connected, otherwise false.

      • powerOffCard

        public boolean powerOffCard()
        Powers off the card. If you want to receive the result of power off card, you need to register a callback using setOnCardPowerOffCompleteListener() method.
        Specified by:
        powerOffCard in class BluetoothReader
        Returns:
        true if the reader is connected, otherwise false.

      • powerOnCard

        public boolean powerOnCard()
        Powers on the card. If you want to receive the result of power on card, you need to register a callback using setOnAtrAvailableListener() method.
        Specified by:
        powerOnCard in class BluetoothReader
        Returns:
        true if the reader is connected, otherwise false.

      • setOnBatteryLevelAvailableListener

        public void setOnBatteryLevelAvailableListener(Acr1255uj1Reader.OnBatteryLevelAvailableListener listener)
        Registers a callback to be invoked when the battery level is available.
        Parameters:
        listener - the callback that will run.

      • setOnBatteryLevelChangeListener

        public void setOnBatteryLevelChangeListener(Acr1255uj1Reader.OnBatteryLevelChangeListener listener)
        Registers a callback to be invoked when the battery level change notification is received.
        Parameters:
        listener - the battery status change callback that will run.

      • transmitApdu

        public boolean transmitApdu(byte[] apdu)
        Transmits the APDU. If you want to receive the response APDU, you need to register a callback using setOnResponseApduAvailableListener() method.
        Specified by:
        transmitApdu in class BluetoothReader
        Parameters:
        apdu - the APDU to be sent.
        Returns:
        true if the reader is connected, otherwise false.

      • transmitEscapeCommand

        public boolean transmitEscapeCommand(byte[] escapeCommand)
        Transmits the escape command. If you want to receive the result of transmit escape command, you need to register a callback using setOnEscapeResponseAvailableListener() method.
        Specified by:
        transmitEscapeCommand in class BluetoothReader
        Parameters:
        escapeCommand - the escape command to be sent.
        Returns:
        true if the reader is connected, otherwise false.
